description: This file defines the AuditorAwareConfig class which implements Spring Data's AuditorAware interface to provide current auditor information, typically for auditing purposes. It retrieves the current authentication ID from a request context holder and defaults to 'SYSTEM_USER' if no auth ID is available.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: Implements AuditorAware to supply the current auditor (user ID) for auditing purposes in a Spring Data environment.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Provides the current auditor's ID, returning 'SYSTEM_USER' if no auth ID is present.
